CustomReport.title: Dic2-Statistics(2020)
CustomReport.description: Reports on total number of system supplied entries in key dictionary tables
CustomReport.SQL:
CREATE TABLE #Stats (Table_Name char(100) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS, Records integer)
Insert into #Stats (Table_Name, Records) values('Taxon_List', 0) Insert into #Stats (Table_Name, Records) values('Taxon', 0) Insert into #Stats (Table_Name, Records) values('Taxon_Version', 0) Insert into #Stats (Table_Name, Records) values('Taxon_List_Item', 0) Insert into #Stats (Table_Name, Records) values('Organism', 0)
Update #Stats set Records = (Select count(*) from Taxon WHERE TAXON.SYSTEM_SUPPLIED_DATA = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TAXON_VERSION WHERE TAXON_VERSION.TAXON_KEY = TAXON.TAXON_KEY)) where #Stats.Table_Name = 'Taxon'
Update #Stats set Records = (Select count(*) from Taxon_List WHERE SYSTEM_SUPPLIED_DATA = 1) where #Stats.Table_Name = 'Taxon_List'
Update #Stats set Records = (Select count(*) from Taxon_List_Item WHERE SYSTEM_SUPPLIED_DATA = 1) where #Stats.Table_Name = 'Taxon_List_Item'
Update #Stats set Records = (Select count(*) from Taxon_Version WHERE SYSTEM_SUPPLIED_DATA = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TAXON_LIST_ITEM WHERE TAXON_LIST_ITEM.TAXON_VERSION_KEY = TAXON_VERSION.TAXON_VERSION_KEY) ) where #Stats.Table_Name = 'Taxon_Version'
Update #Stats set Records = (Select count(*) from Organism WHERE SYSTEM_SUPPLIED_DATA = 1) where #Stats.Table_Name = 'Organism'
SELECT * FROM #Stats
DROP TABLE #Stats
